articles.description: Researchers are investigating the effects of nicotine on COVID-19, the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and evidence for a surprising
articles.content:
Researchers are investigating the effects of nicotine on COVID-19, the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and evidence for a surprising hypothesis: Cigarette smokers are less likely than non-smokers to contract the virus.

articles.title: DHEC reports 113 new COVID-19 cases, 1 additional death - WYFF4 Greenville
articles.description: The South Carolina Department of Health and Environmental Control announced 113 new cases of coronavirus in the state on Sunday.
articles.content:
The South Carolina Department of Health and Environmental Control announced 113 new cases of coronavirus in the state on Sunday.
DHEC says that brings the total to 7,653 cases confirmed in South Carolina.

articles.title: Study finds that people who have coronavirus could die 10 years early - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Glasgow found that a coronavirus diagnosis might shorten life expectancy by 10 years, even despite a full recovery.
articles.content:
Researchers have found that a COVID-19 diagnosis might have more detrimental consequences than one might expect. 
On average, you can lose more than a decade of your life to the novel coronavirus — even if you've recovered from a virus — according to a recen… [+1706 chars]

articles.author: Alexandra Sternlicht
articles.title: Coronavirus Found In Semen: Can It Be Sexually Transmitted? - Forbes
articles.description: A new study found COVID-19 in semen of male patients.
articles.content:
Coronavirus was found in semen of recovering and acute male COVID-19 patients in a small study conducted in January and February in China, though it remains unknown, according to the CDC, whether the disease can be transmitted sexually.
